snippet: With Andy Ricker in the kitchen, Pok Pok Phat Thai on the Lower East Side takes you perhaps as close as you can get in New York to authentic pad Thai.
abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Pok Pok Phat Thai restaurant on the Lower East Side of Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: With Andy Ricker in the kitchen, Pok Pok Phat Thai on the Lower East Side takes you perhaps as close as you can get in New York to authentic pad Thai.
